title: Hall of Fame Game, Aaron Rodgers Offseason,  Raiders Expectations, and Jets camp
itunes:title: Hall of Fame Game, Aaron Rodgers Offseason,  Raiders Expectations, and Jets camp
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with The Hall of Fame Game in Canton, Ohio. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty discuss an impressive debut for Travon Walker even in defeat.  AJ Brown gives his thoughts on leaving Tennessee while Aaron Rodgers expands his mind and contemplates his future in the NFL.  Jason explains why Rodgers tenure in Green Bay will be as long as the QB wants it to be.  The table debates how important a playoff run will be for the Raiders, but Peter doesn't want to hear talk about the schedule. We wrap the week with a stop at Jets camp and early thoughts on Zach Wilson.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

We wrap the week with a stop at Jets camp and early thoughts on Zach Wilson.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.
